name: tm86
effect: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user snares the foe with grass
and trips it. The heavier the foe, the
greater the damage.

The user snares the foe with grass
and trips it. The heavier the foe, the
greater the damage.

and trips it. The heavier the target,
the greater the damage.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the
target on the next turn. This move hits even if the
target protects itself.
